column4: I am running 10.10 and using Openbox as a WM. I would like to use cairo-compmgr for compositing. There is a ppa on the developers site, but it is for debian. Can I use this ppa in ubuntu?
Can anyone answer this question: Can you use debian ppa in ubuntu?
I would suggest not doing that
is there a particular applicatoin you are not findin gon ubuntu that is available in debian repos?
